root: ^There is no greater pain in this world than being forgotten. And there is no harsher sting than knowing your child doesn’t know your touch.

^You swim in that vast ocean of stars a warrior, but you will be some distant memory to your lover who will dream of sweet tender memories with you as though they were like plays, repeated ad nauseam in a desperate attempt to keep you close to their heart.
^You will not be there to see them off to school.
^You might as well be as distant to your loved ones as the stars are to them in the starry sky.
